# NAME

art_modern-mpi -- Modernized ART Simulator of Diverse Next-Generation Sequencing Reads with MPI Support

# SYNOPSIS

mpiexec -n [numprocess] **art_modern-mpi** [options]

# USAGE

See `mpiexec -n 1 art_modern-mpi --help`.

# SEE ALSO

art_illumina(1)
